vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
Unitroller.fallback (ComptrollerHarness.sol#2829-2844) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = comptrollerImplementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (ComptrollerHarness.sol#2831-2833)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UnitrollerAdminStorage.comptrollerImplementation (ComptrollerHarness.sol#2567-2569) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- adminOrInitializing (ComptrollerHarness.sol#4240-4244)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Comp.getChainId (ComptrollerHarness.sol#3141-3148) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (ComptrollerHarness.sol#1182-1244) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (ComptrollerHarness.sol#1208)
	-transferFrom (ComptrollerHarness.sol#1222)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
Comp._writeCheckpoint (ComptrollerHarness.sol#3107-3120) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (ComptrollerHarness.sol#2326-2338):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerHarness.sol#2327-2328)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerHarness.sol#2334-2335)

Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (ComptrollerHarness.sol#2386-2396):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerHarness.sol#2387-2388)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerHarness.sol#2393-2394)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

Reentrancy in Comptroller._setCompSpeeds (ComptrollerHarness.sol#4409-4433):

	- borrowIndex = Exp(cToken.borrowIndex()) (ComptrollerHarness.sol#4424-4425)
	- updateCompSupplyIndex(address(cToken)) (ComptrollerHarness.sol#4425-4426)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- compSupplyState (ComptrollerHarness.sol#4425-4426)
